segments.text: Ugh, that sink is disgusting with water gushing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is filthy, soaking her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's handling that dirty plate without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are grubby, climbing and grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks grimy, who knows what's on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand deep in the jar, probably covered in crumbs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, eager for the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets, ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is so sloppy and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open window letting in outside dirt too, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron she's wearing will be soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes waiting to be washed, piling up grossness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's revolting how unaware they all are of the filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden might be nice, but inside it's a swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR
